_instructions.howToAddNewEvent: To add a new ICPC event, simply add a new object to the achievements array with the following fields: id (unique), title, emoji, description, imagePath (filename from src/assets/images/icpc/), and year. The system will automatically display it in the correct year section with the same UI.
_instructions.imagePath_example: Put your image in src/assets/images/icpc/ folder and use just the filename like 'my-event-2024.jpg'
_instructions.year_sorting: Events are automatically grouped and sorted by year in descending order

header.title: ICPC Legacy
description: The International Collegiate Programming Contest (ICPC) is the world's most prestigious algorithmic competition for university students.
Over the years, Turing Hut members have consistently proven their excellence in ICPC and other competitive programming events across India.

about.title: About ICPC
description: The International Collegiate Programming Contest (ICPC) is a global competition that challenges students to solve algorithmic problems efficiently under time constraints.
It encourages teamwork, problem-solving, and logical thinking — skills at the heart of Turing Hut's mission to cultivate technical excellence.
about.quote: 🚀 Every algorithm solved, every line debugged — adds a brick to the Turing Hut ICPC legacy.
